body_html: I have not had success getting TensorFlow GPU to work through apt-get install cuda-toolkit, hence I always install cuda through tarbar from NVidia website. That puts CUDA in /usr/local/cuda directory
body_text: I have not had success getting TensorFlow GPU to work through apt-get install cuda-toolkit, hence I always install cuda through tarbar from NVidia website. That puts CUDA in /usr/local/cuda directory
body: I have not had success getting TensorFlow GPU to work through apt-get install cuda-toolkit, hence I always install cuda through tarbar from NVidia website. That puts CUDA in /usr/local/cuda directory
